item.description:
Anyone interested in kayaking? Anyone interested in Ultimate Frisbee? How about both ... at the same time!!!

Alright, no, we ARE NOT going to do both at the same time, but why don't you come out and join us for some kayaking on a gentle river and for some Ultimate Frisbee on a huge open field. Now is a perfect time to see some of Massachusetts' fall colors, and to play a little bit more Ultimate Frisbee before it gets too cold for shorts and an aggressive hammer throw.

This will all be taking place over at Noble and Greenough School this Sunday. Although all should go as planned, I will need to get your phone numbers just in case 1) it rains, or 2) the kayaks become unavailable (since these are school-owned kayaks, we cannot reserve them directly). Bob will check for us on Saturday to make sure that kayaks are available for Sunday.

Many thanks to Bob Graham for suggesting this event, and for providing access to the kayaks and playing field.

What to Bring:
- Food - bring a lunch with you; feel free to bring extra food for friends as well
- Water - bring a water bottle with you, you may want it during Ultimate Frisbee or while kayaking
- Pair of athletic pants and sandals for the kayak (shorts may be fine as well).
- Change of clothes. Although I hope no one ends up in the river, you may want to bring a change of clothes just in case

No Car?
For those of you without a car, we can pick you up from Forest Hills T Stop at 10:30 AM. Please let me know if you will need a ride from the T Station.

Driving Directions:

For directions to Nobles, see below, or go to: http://www.nobles.edu.... (There is a map on the website).

TRAVELING SOUTH ON RT.128 (US 95)
Take Exit 18 (Great Plain Avenue)
At end of ramp, turn right.
Continue one mile and bear right at St. Susanna's Church onto Pine St.
Continue 1/4 mile to the school entrance which is on the right.

TRAVELING NORTH ON RT.128 (US 95)

Take Exit 16
Take Rt. 109 toward Dedham.
Follow 109 to second traffic light and turn left onto Pine St. School entrance is the first left turn.

TRAVELING ON RT. 1/THE VFW PARKWAY (either way)

Turn onto Rt. 109 West.
Turn right at second traffic light onto Pine St.
School entrance is the first left turn.

Once at Nobles, people should go straight past the first and second intersections, and park near the gym.

See you all there!
item.how_to_find_us: We will start out at the large sports field.
item.name: Autumn Colors Kayaking & Ultimate Frisbee - More Details Added
